subTitle: A Quick Refresher on Stages!
definition: Notice that not all nodes are evaluated all the time! Only those in the active stage are!
paragraph1: This is a quick refresher on strategy stages! If you haven't read the docs on trading systems and strategies, then find the time and do it!
callOut: Notice how conditions are no longer highlighted for the candles within the position.
paragraph2: This is because you are looking at the ->Trigger Stage-> definitions. These definitions are evaluated until a ->Strategy-> is triggered. Once triggered, the ->Open Stage-> kicks in, and so on!
